title: Optimal sums of three cubes in $\mathbb{F}_q[t]$
authors: Tim Browning, Jakob Glas, Victor Y. Wang
abstract:
We use the circle method to prove that a density 1 of elements in
$\mathbb{F}_q[t]$ are representable as a sum of three cubes of essentially
minimal degree from $\mathbb{F}_q[t]$, assuming the Ratios Conjecture and that
the characteristic is bigger than 3. Roughly speaking, to do so, we upgrade an
order of magnitude result to a full asymptotic formula that was conjectured by
Hooley in the number field setting.
